content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 2, Newcastle United 0.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 2, Newcastle United 0.
Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Virgil van Dijk (Liverpool).
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Mohamed Diamé.
Substitution, Liverpool. Joel Matip replaces Roberto Firmino.
Adam Lallana (Liverpool) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (Newcastle United).
Substitution, Newcastle United. Ayoze Pérez replaces Jacob Murphy.
Attempt blocked. Joselu (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jamaal Lascelles with a headed pass.
Foul by Jordan Henderson (Liverpool).
Isaac Hayden (Newcastle United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Isaac Hayden.
Attempt blocked. Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Kenedy (Newcastle United).
Emre Can (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Liverpool. James Milner replaces Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain.
Attempt missed. Isaac Hayden (Newcastle United) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Christian Atsu with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Dejan Lovren.
Attempt blocked. Kenedy (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Offside, Liverpool. Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain tries a through ball, but Adam Lallana is caught offside.
Substitution, Liverpool. Adam Lallana replaces Sadio Mané.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Isaac Hayden replaces Mikel Merino.
Attempt blocked. Jacob Murphy (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Christian Atsu.

Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Kenedy.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Joselu replaces Dwight Gayle.
Mikel Merino (Newcastle United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Andrew Robertson (Liverpool).
Goal!  Liverpool 2, Newcastle United 0. Sadio Mané (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Roberto Firmino.

Attempt missed. Sadio Mané (Liverpool) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Roberto Firmino.
Goal!  Liverpool 1, Newcastle United 0. Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain.
